title: Need ADC DUO to get out of silver with
body:
Silver V Support main, need an adc to grind with to try to rank up, IGN: Theslim
Prefer someone who has discord, but if not its fine.

replies.body: iv also been looking for people to play with to help climb
ahhh  i kind of dont give a f**k anymore add me if you want we can try and see how it goes
